Text: Hi I did just about everything asked in the instructions but I get this error message "SuperMeatBoy.exe has encountered a problem and needs to close...." I tried adding it as a non-steam game and still did not work. Is there a particular file or software missing maybe?

@TTSoul540

Update your DirectX

and make sure you have

Microsoft Visual C++ 2008

Some people just have trouble running it.
you can also try the THETA release, but you might have the same problem.
Update 2 is already out there. This is stupid beta testing. :/

Many thanks for the upload â€“ I just wish I could get out of â€œThe best resolution is 1280 x 1024 x 75htzâ€ - and then giving me the black screen of death!
So I donâ€™t want to sound stupid, but how do you do this on Win XP Pro : - â€œGo to Library, then Right Click on Super Meat Boy and go to Properties â€œ Cos for the life of me I canâ€™t figure out what you mean! Cheers ïŠ

Create a "shortcut" and add those option.

e.g.)

from
"X:\Games\Super Meat Boy\SuperMeatBoy.exe"

to
"X:\Games\Super Meat Boy\SuperMeatBoy.exe" -option1here -option2here -blahblah

to (practical one)
"X:\Games\Super Meat Boy\SuperMeatBoy.exe" -1024x768

keep in mind that only list options are working. Ive checked their exe and found that there's no such a thing like -1600x900 yeah dev guys are lazy or something. D:

This version actually worked for me.  All the others were freezing at when i finished level 3!

Thx!
@ klord2010 - thanks for the help buddy :-) Worked like a charm got ot windowed and at the right resolution. Thanks again
